Module org.jgrapht.demo
Package org.jgrapht.demo

Class JGraphXAdapterDemo

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • java.applet.Applet
            • javax.swing.JApplet
              • org.jgrapht.demo.JGraphXAdapterDemo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer
    public class JGraphXAdapterDemo
extends javax.swing.JApplet
    A demo applet that shows how to use JGraphX to visualize JGraphT graphs. Applet based on JGraphAdapterDemo.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
